name: A Dragon Quest
description:
A Dragon Quest is an original Game Boy inspired game where you are a greedy and ferocious dragon. This beast is on the hunt for loot and a new home. The game is quite short but we tried our best to be as close from the GB experience :  

-Sprites are made from the only 4 green shades available

- Musics and sound effects are 8-Bits

- The basic shooter style gameplay was chosen for that
